Name: Teeth Cleaning
Description: Professional cleaning to remove tartar and plaque using an ultrasonic scaler.

Name: Cavity Filling
Description: Treatment of dental cavities with high-quality composite filling to restore the tooth's function and aesthetics.

Name: Tooth Extraction
Description: Removal of a tooth due to damage, infection, or orthodontic reasons.

Name: Teeth Whitening
Description: Professional whitening procedure using special gels and lamps to achieve a brighter smile.

Name: Veneers
Description: Placement of thin porcelain veneers to improve the appearance of front teeth, giving them a natural and attractive look.

Name: Full Mouth X-Ray
Description: Panoramic x-ray is a two-dimensional (2-D) dental x-ray examination that captures the entire mouth in a single image, including the teeth, upper and lower jaws.

Name: Dental Crown
Description: Custom-made cap placed over a damaged tooth to restore its shape, strength, and function.

Name: Orthodontic Braces
Description: Application of braces to correct misaligned teeth and improve bite over time.

Name: Dental Implant
Description: Surgical placement of an implant to replace a missing tooth, providing a natural-looking and functional solution.
